# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $9500. This special price is tailored to ensure you receive exceptional value while also maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
